name: Flourless Chocolate Cake II
author: Shana Hillman
summary: Perfect for chocolate lovers! Great for entertaining, deceptively easy to make. Perfect for people who can't have gluten. Serve warm with ice cream or whipped cream, or simply dusted with icing sugar. I flour the pan using cocoa powder so it won't leave white marks on the cake and keeps it totally gluten-free.
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Grease an 8 inch round cake pan, and dust with cocoa powder
In the top of a double boiler over lightly simmering water, melt chocolate and butter
Remove from heat, and stir in sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, and vanilla
Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes
Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely
Slices can also be reheated for 20 to 30 seconds in the microwave before serving
